_sText:
Hello, this is my third hosties map I have made.
It has a winter-themed textures so I named it hosties_siberia, I was thinking of to add trees to the background, but didn't think that was necessary.

You can find shot for shot and gun toss from the map, and the pit is tricky, its deep and underwater, if the T choose to get their weapons back, they might lose some health on the run. :)

I hope you enjoy playing the map.
Constructive criticism is welcome, but don't bother opening your mouth if all you can say is flaming.

Omena,


EDIT: We have just played 20 minutes on the map and it has been a great success!
The pit is funny, a deathtrap, good for chicken fight, rofl.
There is the ultimate rebel hide in the map, when you find it, you'll camp it for the rest of your life. Lol!
Everyone on the server seemed to like the map and graded it 9+.
